articles.title: Introduction to Haskell
articles.summary: Start your journey into functional programming with Haskell. Learn about its pure functions, lazy evaluation, and type system that make it unique and powerful.

articles.title: Basic Functions and Types
articles.summary: Explore Haskell's type system, function declarations, and how its strong static typing helps prevent bugs before they happen.

articles.title: Lists and List Operations
articles.summary: Master Haskell's powerful list manipulation capabilities, from basic operations to advanced list comprehensions and infinite lists.

articles.title: Pattern Matching
articles.summary: Learn how pattern matching makes your code more expressive and concise while handling complex data structures elegantly.

articles.title: Higher-Order Functions
articles.summary: Discover the power of functions that operate on other functions, enabling elegant abstractions and reusable code patterns.

articles.title: Recursion
articles.summary: Master recursive thinking in Haskell, from basic recursive patterns to advanced techniques like tail recursion optimization.

articles.title: Type Classes
articles.summary: Understand Haskell's type class system, a powerful way to write generic code that works across different types.

articles.title: Function Composition
articles.summary: Learn to combine functions elegantly using composition, creating complex behaviors from simple building blocks.

articles.title: Error Handling
articles.summary: Explore Haskell's robust error handling mechanisms using Maybe, Either, and custom types for safe, predictable code.

articles.title: Result Objects
articles.summary: Learn to use Result objects for elegant error handling and railway-oriented programming in Haskell.

articles.title: Immutable Records
articles.summary: Explore the benefits of using immutable records in Haskell for safer and more predictable code.

articles.title: Custom Types and Data Modeling
articles.summary: Learn how to define custom types and model complex data structures in Haskell.

articles.title: IO and Effects
articles.summary: Understand how Haskell handles input/output and side effects in a pure functional way.

articles.title: Testing in Haskell
articles.summary: Discover the tools and techniques for effective testing in Haskell.
